description:
《英乐天天唱》是一档模仿唱歌类节目，目的在于提升大家的英语口语能力。主持人会在每期节目中选取好听的歌曲片段，并给出发音提示和模仿示例。喜欢听音乐的童鞋可要积极参与哦！去沪江部落订阅本节目！

[00:01.46]Charice - Note To God
[00:06.93]If I wrote a note to God
[00:14.93]I would speak whats in my soul
[00:22.19]Id ask for all the hate to be swept away
[00:28.18]For love to overflow
[00:38.88]If I wrote a note to God
[00:46.80]Id pour my heart out on each page
[00:54.22]Id ask for war to end
[00:57.19]And for peace to mend this world
[01:02.92]Id say Id say Id say
[01:12.44]Give us the strength to make it through
[01:15.42]Help us find love cause love is over due
[01:19.42]And it seems like so much is goin wrong
[01:23.41]On this road we're
[01:31.02]If I wrote a note to God
[01:38.89]Id say please help us find our way
[01:46.30]End all the bitterness put some tenderness in our hearts
[01:54.89]Id say Id say Id say
[02:04.43]Give us the strength to make it through
[02:07.43]Help us find love cause love is over due
[02:11.40]And it looks like we havent got a clue
[02:15.41]Need some help from you
[02:20.47]Grant us the faith to carry on
[02:23.40]Give us hope when it seems all hope is gone
[02:27.44]Cause it seems like so much is goin wrong
[02:31.39]On this road were on
[02:36.90]No no no no
[02:41.41]We cant do this on our own
[02:44.89]So so
[02:51.04]Give us the strength to make it through
[02:53.97]Help us find love cause love is over due
[02:57.99]And it looks like we havent got a clue
[03:02.00]Need some help~~~
[03:07.09]Grant us the faith to carry on
[03:10.14]Give us hope when it seems all hope is gone
[03:14.02]Cause it seems like so much is goin wrong
[03:17.97]On this road were on
[03:23.55]No no no no
[03:28.01]We cant do this on our own
[03:31.45]So so
[03:39.01]If I wrote a note to God~~~~~~~
